content.text:
# List of war metal bands

This is a list of war metal bands. War metal (also known as war black metal or bestial black metal) is an aggressive, cacophonous and chaotic subgenre of blackened death metal.
List of bands
* Archgoat
* Axis of Perdition
* Bahimiron
* Beherit
* Bestial Warlust
* Blasphemy
* Blood Revolt

* Diocletian
* Holocausto
* Impiety
* In Battle
* Nuclear Blaze
* Revenge
* Teitanblood
* Zyklon-B
